</div>

Average Rating

This is the average rating component.

Average Rating: 3 out of 5 stars

Markup Details
                            {{ attach_library('nitflex_theme/average-rating') }}

<div class="average-rating">
  <ul class="average-rating__stars" data-rating="{{ count }}">
    {% for i in 1..5 %}
      <li class="average-rating__star">
        <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="30px" height="30px" viewBox="0 0 30 30">
          <polygon points="15,0 11.3,11.2 0,11.5 9,18.6 5.7,30 15,23.2 24.3,30 21,18.6 30,11.5 18.7,11.2 15,0 "/>
          <polyline points="15,5.2 17.2,11.7 17.5,12.8 18.7,12.8 25.5,13 20,17.4 19.1,18 19.4,19.1 21.4,25.9 16,21.9 
            15,21.2 14,21.9 8.6,25.9 10.6,19.1 10.9,18 10,17.4 4.5,13 11.3,12.8 12.5,12.8 12.8,11.7 15,5.2 "/>
        </svg>
      </li>
    {% endfor %}
  </ul>
    <p class="average-rating__text">{{ 'Average Rating:'|t }} {{ count }} {{ 'out of 5 stars'|t }}</p>
</div>
